text: Hi! I'm Lucca, majoring in CS in University of Brasília, in Brazil. I am learning datascience using Julia and Pluto notebooks. Interested in solving major world problems, solar energy, EVs, autonomous cars, AI, Julia and quantum computing. Feel free to reach out!

text:
Hi, I lived as an exchange student in Salvador, Bahia. My dream (once my youngest son is in college) is to become a digital nomad, and work remotely from a beach in Brazil!
I’m currently consulting for a quantum computing company (Zapata), if you have any questions about that.

text: Hi Scott! It seems you've taking a liking for our beaches and I can't blame you haha and I'm sure you get there in no time. Ohh Zapata Computing, amazing! I sure do, thanks for asking
